name: Plandemic
description:
Note: To play with the leaderboard, you need to download the game natively!

Premise

You play as a public health planner, a member of the community is infected with reditis! Maintain quarantine by moving villagers around to keep the spread of reditis below 50%!

Controls

WASD - Move Camera

QE - Rotate Camera

Click villagers to teleport them to another spot
